## IComponentDebugData.componentStats property

组件分布统计

**Signature:**

```typescript
componentStats: Array<{
        typeName: string;
        instanceCount: number;
        memoryPerInstance: number;
        totalMemory: number;
        poolSize: number;
        poolUtilization: number;
        averagePerEntity?: number;
    }>;
```
